name: stocks_30q_health_yes_no
title: 30 Yes/No Stock Health Questions (News/Text Analysis)
description: Binary stock health questionnaire from news; YES=1, NO=0; total maps to BUY/HOLD/SELL.

variables.name: texts
variables.description: Recent headlines/summaries/bodies about the company and sector.

questions.text: Is the overall tone of recent news about this stock positive?
Do recent headlines use more positive words than negative words?
Are analyst reports mentioning growth opportunities?
Is the company being compared favorably to competitors in articles?
Are there more upgrade mentions than downgrade mentions in recent news?
Is media coverage increasing in frequency over the past week?
Did the company report revenue growth in the latest earnings announcement?
Did the company beat analyst expectations in the latest report?
Did the company announce any new product launches recently?
Did the company report expanding profit margins in recent statements?
Is the company mentioned as gaining market share in news articles?
Did the company announce any strategic partnerships or acquisitions?
Are customer reviews or satisfaction metrics mentioned positively?
Did management express confidence in future outlook in recent statements?
Do economic reports indicate GDP growth in relevant markets?
Are interest rate decisions favorable for this sector (mentioned in news)?
Is inflation trending in a direction that benefits this industry?
Are there mentions of supportive government policies for this sector?
Do trade policy updates favor this company's operations?
Is consumer confidence reported as rising in relevant markets?
Is the company's industry described as growing in recent reports?
Are barriers to entry in this sector mentioned as high?
Is demand for the company's products/services described as increasing?
Are supply chain conditions improving according to news?
Is the company mentioned as an industry leader or innovator?
Are regulatory concerns decreasing or absent in recent news?
Is litigation or legal risk decreasing or absent in recent news?
Are management and governance issues absent from recent articles?
Is the company's debt level described as manageable or improving?
Are geopolitical risks affecting this stock stable or improving?

prompt.system: You are a precise equity analyst. Answer strictly with JSON.
prompt.instructions: Evaluate provided news texts for the single ticker. For each question, answer YES if the texts support a bullish/positive interpretation for the stock; otherwise answer NO. Be decisive and avoid hedging. Do not use outside knowledge beyond the timeframe.
notes: Run all 30 questions for the stock.
Provide a brief one-sentence explanation for your choice.

response_template.rationale: Optional short summary of key drivers.
